title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 20 ยง 2371.10 - Fees
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 20 ยง 2371.10 - Fees

State Regulations

Unless otherwise provided for by the Tax Law, the collection
of fees with respect to requests for access to records and/or amendment or
correction of records pursuant to this Part shall be governed by the provisions
of section
2370.9
of this

Title. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 20
ยง
2371.10

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
